content: Disciplined execution over the last 15 years allowed us to generate consistent unit sales growth in local currency, navigate some very challenging economic periods and improved operating results even as competition intensified in the regionâs underpenetrated QSR industry. Will you please comment on the market share dynamics across the region, and especially in Brazil, given the strong same-store sales growth and volume growth that we seem to understand how they behaved in the competitive environment thatâs playing out today as well as our differentiated initiatives.
